snippet: What did a young woman in Berlin do when her boss, a man, told her that women had no role to play in the emerging technology sector of Internet-based startups? What would you do?
abstract: What did a young woman in Berlin do when her boss, a man, told her that women had no role to play in the emerging technology sector of Internet-based startups? What would you do?

headline.main: In German Tech Industry, Women Fight Conservative Views
